overview: Is it any easier for porn stars to work the sex-and-relationships thing than it is for regular guys? MSR took a hard-on look at the lives of superstars MATT BRADSHAW, ERIC HANSON ( Playgirl's Mr. December 2000), YORK POWERS, and newcomer ANDREW ADDAMS ( a sex pig in the grand MSR tradition). When these four studs meet up to sway "war" stories, you may not learn the answer, but you'll ask the question again and again!
tagline: Where the Hottest Men are Always Pigs
title: Sex in the City
